title: Fps problems
body: Idk what's going on as I have never had fps problems before but my fps for my last two have been under 10 fps and it's really hard to do anything.

replies.body: FPS issues can be caused by a number of reasons, but typically I see that checking for driver updates can help to bring those frames back up. Check our out [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1) if you're unsure how to update those drivers, and be sure to check out the other steps listed there as well.
Its caused from you riot. Theres a riot in russia admiting that the fps issues came along with the latest patches. Now when can you notice..

I did every step in the FPS Guide and took my laptop to 2 different computer repair places. They performed PC diagnostics and both places said my hardware and software checked out. Even when I set my in-game video settings to the lowest settings, I still get drops as low as 3 fps. It's actually gotten more frequent in the past week. So...what do I do now?

Ok For those with fps problems that are stuck with high end graphic cards ima be copying and pasting my post so it my help or may not, All I did to fix my fps problem was check a box in the settings of league to close league client during game. Fixed my fps drop completely hope this helps :)
